member.name: T:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid
member.summary: Provides a grid control that can be used to display the properties of VectorDraw objects.

member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the vdPropertyGrid class.

member.name: M:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.Clear
member.summary: Clear the seleted object and update the globalized property descriptors.

member.name: M:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.RefreshGrid
member.summary: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.

member.name: E:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.PropertyValueChanged
member.summary: Fires when a value in the property grid was changed.

member.name: E:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.FilterVisibilityProperty
member.summary: Fires before a property added in the property grid to control the visibility.

member.name: E:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.FilterReadOnlyProperty
member.summary: Fires before a property added in the property grid to control in order to make it as redonly or not.

member.name: E:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged
member.summary: Fires a new grid item get the focus.

member.name: E:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.SelectedObjectChange
member.summary: Fires before a new object selected in the property grid control.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.UseGroupItems
member.summary: Use this boolean value in order to control if groupd items are going to be added in the combobox of the properties list.
member.remarks: Default value is true which means that groups are used. If a user selects 3 vdCircles and 2 vdLines then at the combobox of the properties list will be available the following options 5 Items (Use this option to select all 5 items and make a change) 3 vdCircle Items (Use this option to select only the vdCircle objects to make a change) 2 vdLine Items (Use this option to select only the vdLine objects to make a change) and then follow the individual items Using the UseGroupItems = true basically enables the 3 vdCirlce and the 2 vdLine items at the combobox. The rest are default.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.Grid
member.summary: Returns the child control.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.ReadOnly
member.summary: Get/Set the visibility for all items in the property grid.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.Font
member.summary: Get/Set the TrueType Font name used to display the items of the grid control.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.ShowSelectedItemComboBox
member.summary: Get/Set a boolean value that represents the visibility of selected items combo box.

member.name: P:vdPropertyGrid.vdPropertyGrid.SelectedObject
member.summary: Get/Set the selected object of the grid control.

member.name: T:vdPropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChangedDelegate
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the SelectedGridItemChanged event.
member.param: The name of the Object Type where the previous selected GridItem property belongs to.
The name of the previous selected GridItem property.
The name of the Object Type where the currently selected GridItem property belongs to.

A boolean reference value that represents if the currently selected item can get the focus.

member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the SelectedObjectChange event.

A boolean reference value that represents if the currently selected item can be changed to the newObject.
